description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer with 3 front roof lights and conversion of roof from hip to gable end with new gable end window and a new porch and rendering of external walls of property (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
decision_conditions: The proposed external rendering of the property does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Condition A.3(a), Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because insufficient information has been provided to demonstrate that the materials will be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse.

The proposed front porch does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of paragraph D.1(b), Class D, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because the ground area (measured externally) of the structure would exceed 3 square metres.

The proposed front porch does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of paragraph D.1(c), Class D, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because the structure would be more than 3 metres above ground level.
